import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { AuthenticatedUser } from "../contexts/AuthenticatedUser.js" const Register = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({ username: '', password: '', success: false }); const { authUser, setAuthUser } = useContext(AuthenticatedUser) const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); const userData = { username: user.username, password: user.password } console.log(userData) axios.post('http://localhost:5000/users/add', userData) .then(res => setUser({ success: true })) .catch(err => { alert(err) setUser({ username: '', password: '', success: false }) }); } return ( !user.success ?
{ setUser({ username: e.target.value, password: user.password }) }} />
{ setUser({ username: user.username, password: e.target.value }) }} />
